Name: Montréal
Ingredients: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A rye whiskey-based Sweet Manhattan with French Creole influence.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Kathy Casey's 2009 book Sips & Apps .
Nutrition: One serving of Montréal contains 151 calories
